    • Method Detail

      • vcxProvisionAgent

        public static String vcxProvisionAgent(String config)
        Provision an agent in the agency, populate configuration and wallet for this agent.
        NOTE: for asynchronous call use vcx_agent_provision_async
        Parameters:
        config - configuration
        Returns:
        result 
        
  Example:
  // VCX Agent Provision Config
          String provisionConfig  = JsonPath.parse("{" +
                 "  agency_url: 'http://localhost:8080'," + // use local
                 "  agency_did: 'VsKV7grR1BUE29mG2Fm2kX'," +
                 "  agency_verkey: 'Hezce2UWMZ3wUhVkh2LfKSs8nDzWwzs2Win7EzNN3YaR'," +
                 "  wallet_name: 'node_vcx_demo_faber_wallet_" + utime + "'," +
                 "  wallet_key: '123'," +
                 "  payment_method: 'null'," +
                 "  enterprise_seed: '00000000000000000000000Endorser1'" + // SEED of faber's DID already registered in the ledger
                 "}").jsonString();

  // Communication method. aries.
  // Running with Aries VCX Enabled! Make sure VCX agency is configured to use protocol_type 4.0
         provisionConfig = JsonPath.parse(provisionConfig).put("$", "protocol_type", "4.0").jsonString();

  // add webhook url to config
         provisionConfig = JsonPath.parse(provisionConfig).put("$", "webhook_url", webhookUrl).jsonString();

  // Config used to provision agent in agency
         String vcxConfig = UtilsApi.vcxProvisionAgent(provisionConfig);
  // VCX Config & provision to initialize VCX
         vcxConfig = JsonPath.parse(vcxConfig).put("$", "institution_name", "faber")
                 .put("$", "institution_logo_url", "http://robohash.org/234")
                 .put("$", "protocol_version", "2")
                 .put("$", "genesis_path", System.getProperty("user.dir") + "/genesis.txn").jsonString();
         VcxApi.vcxInitWithConfig(vcxConfig).get();

  // addRecordWallet
         WalletApi.addRecordWallet("vcxConfig", "defaultVcxConfig", vcxConfig, "").get();
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        VCX JAVA Demo - Schema Create Example

      • vcxGetMessages

        public static CompletableFuture<String> vcxGetMessages(String messageStatus,
                                                       String uids,
                                                       String pwdids)
                                                throws VcxException
        Retrieve messages from the agent
        Parameters:
        messageStatus - target message status 
         Statuses:
  MS-101 - Created
  MS-102 - Sent
  MS-103 - Received
  MS-104 - Accepted
  MS-105 - Rejected
  MS-106 - Reviewed
        uids - optional, comma separated - query for messages with the specified uids
        pwdids - optional, comma separated - DID's pointing to specific connection
        Returns:
        completable future
        Throws:
        VcxException - Thrown if an error occurs when calling the underlying SDK.
        See Also:
        "Refer credentialSendRequest example for vcx update message demo", CredentialApi.credentialSendRequest(int, int, int)

      • vcxGetAgentMessages

        public static CompletableFuture<String> vcxGetAgentMessages(String messageStatus,
                                                            String uids)
                                                     throws VcxException
        Retrieve messages from the Cloud Agent
        Parameters:
        messageStatus - optional - query for messages with the specified status 
         Statuses:
  MS-101 - Created
  MS-102 - Sent
  MS-103 - Received
  MS-104 - Accepted
  MS-105 - Rejected
  MS-106 - Reviewed
        uids - optional, comma separated - query for messages with the specified uids
        Returns:
        completable future
        Throws:
        VcxException - Thrown if an error occurs when calling the underlying SDK.

      • vcxUpdateMessages

        public static CompletableFuture<Integer> vcxUpdateMessages(String messageStatus,
                                                           String msgJson)
                                                    throws VcxException
        Retrieves pw_did from Connection object
        Parameters:
        messageStatus - target message status 
         Statuses:
  MS-101 - Created
  MS-102 - Sent
  MS-103 - Received
  MS-104 - Accepted
  MS-105 - Rejected
  MS-106 - Reviewed
        msgJson - messages to update: [{"pairwiseDID":"QSrw8hebcvQxiwBETmAaRs","uids":["mgrmngq"]},...]
        Returns:
        completable future
        Throws:
        VcxException - Thrown if an error occurs when calling the underlying SDK.
        See Also:
        "Refer credentialSendRequest example for vcx update message demo", CredentialApi.credentialSendRequest(int, int, int)

      • getLedgerAuthorAgreement

        Returns:
        completable future
        Throws:
        VcxException - Thrown if an error occurs when calling the underlying SDK.

      • setActiveTxnAuthorAgreementMeta

        public static void setActiveTxnAuthorAgreementMeta(String text,
                                                   String version,
                                                   String hash,
                                                   String accMechType,
                                                   long timeOfAcceptance)
                                            throws VcxException
        Retrieve author agreement and acceptance mechanisms set on the Ledger
        Parameters:
        text - (optional) raw data about TAA from ledger.
        These parameters should be passed together.
        These parameters are required if hash parameter is ommited.
        version - target message status
        hash - (optional) hash on text and version. This parameter is required if text and version parameters are ommited.
        accMechType - mechanism how user has accepted the TAA
        timeOfAcceptance - UTC timestamp when user has accepted the TAA
        Throws:
        VcxException - Thrown if an error occurs when calling the underlying SDK.

        public static void setPoolHandle(int handle)

        Parameters:
        handle - pool handle that libvcx should use

      • vcxGetRequestPrice

        public static CompletableFuture<Long> vcxGetRequestPrice(String actionJson,
                                                         String requesterInfoJson)
                                                  throws VcxException
        Gets minimal request price for performing an action in case the requester can perform this action.
        Parameters:
        actionJson - json 
        {
     "auth_type": ledger transaction alias or associated value,
     "auth_action": type of an action.,
     "field": transaction field,
     "old_value": (Optional) old value of a field, which can be changed to a new_value (mandatory for EDIT action),
     "new_value": (Optional) new value that can be used to fill the field,
 }
        requesterInfoJson - indojaon 
        {(Optional) {
     "role": string - role of a user which can sign transaction.
     "count": string - count of users.
     "is_owner": bool - if user is an owner of transaction.
 } otherwise context info will be used
        Returns:
        completable future
        Throws:
        VcxException - Thrown if an error occurs when calling the underlying SDK.

      • vcxEndorseTransaction

                                                        throws VcxException

        Parameters:
        transactionJson - transaction to endorse
        Returns:
        completable future
